amendatorysection.catchline: Effect of reinstatement of series limited liability company or revocation of voluntary dissolution.
amendatorysection.para: If a series limited liability company that has been administratively dissolved is reinstated, or a series limited liability company that voluntarily dissolved rescinds its dissolution:
(1) each protected series of the company ceases winding up; and
(2) section 21-152 applies to each protected series of the company in accordance with section 21-508.
